alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Eastern Clay; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; South Central Duval; Western Marion; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued November 29 at 3:31AM EST until November 30 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...CURRENT FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...NEW FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 8 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the first Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 31 will result in frost formation. For the second Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 34 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Portions of northeast and northern Florida and southeast Georgia. * WHEN...For the first Frost Advisory, until 8 AM EST this morning. For the second Frost Advisory, from 2 AM to 8 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Eastern Clay; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; South Central Duval; Western Marion; Western Putnam
